chunk:
Plaine Products Citrus Face Wash

Brand: Plaine Products

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Oryza (Rice) Extract, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Carrageenan (Red Algae Extract), Sorbitan Caprylate (Cocoa Oil), Propanediol (Corn Oil), Benzoic Acid (Vegetable Based), Cucumis Sativus

ed), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Extract, Sodium Ascorbic Phosphate (Vitamin C), Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (Green Tea).

Directions: Start with wet skin. Apply a small amount of face wash to fingertips and massage gently into the face. Rinse with water and towel blot gently.

Ingredient con

tly.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
